# cds-accordion



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property            | Attribute             | Description                                                 | Type                | Default   |
| ------------------- | --------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | --------- |
| `iconAlign`         | `icon-align`          | Icon alignment - left or right position of toggle icon      | `"left" \| "right"` | `'right'` |
| `openMultipleItems` | `open-multiple-items` | Enable multiple accordion items to be open at the same time | `boolean`           | `true`    |


## Slots

| Slot | Description     |
| ---- | --------------- |
|      | Accordion Items |
